getting_started

getting_started.Rmd
library(kpiwidget)
library(crosstalk)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(htmltools)

# Example data
df <- mtcars %>% 
  mutate(model = rownames(.))

# Wrap in SharedData with row numbers as keys
sd <- SharedData$new(df, key = ~1:nrow(df), group = "mtcars_group")
filter_checkbox("cyl", "Cylinders", sd, ~cyl, inline = TRUE)

Column parameter must be provided. Default kpi is count (lenght of dataset).

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg")

KPI options

sum 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "sum")

mean 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "mean")

min 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "min")

max 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "max")

count 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "count")

distinctCount 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "cyl",
  kpi = "distinctCount")

ratio 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "sum",
  comparison = "ratio",
  group1 = ~cyl == 4)

share 

kpiwidget(
  data = sd,
  column = "mpg",
  kpi = "sum",
  comparison = "share",
  group1 = ~cyl == 4,
  group2 = ~cyl == 4)
